website_summaries.verdict: Provides amazing near-surround sound experience to immerse cinephiles in the action.
pros: Upward-firing speakers augment the cinema-quality sound provided by this soundbar system
Dolby Atmos compatibility and a primary HDMI connection promise clear digital sound
Adaptive sound technology makes hearing voices even clearer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sounding, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: While not perfect, this is still the best sound bar I’ve ever heard. It’s too bad that the Dolby at most while not perfect, this is still the best sound bar I’ve ever heard. It’s too bad that the Dolby Atmos doesn’t work over ARC with Samsung’s own TVs, but then there isn’t a lot of content for that right now anyways. Even though this is a very wide sound bar, it’s still isn’t wide enough to get particularly good stereo separation. However, the audio quality itself combined with a really good sub woofer makes up for it. Voices are very clear, bass is deep and shakes the room, so for the money it’s hard to complain.
customer_reviews.author: B. Greenstone

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound but NO BASS
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled when this arrived. But after using it for a bit, the sound is very clear but you don’t hear any bass at all. I have the subwoofer turned up all the way and still nothing. Music sounds great but not tv.
customer_reviews.author: K F

customer_reviews.title: Sound stops for like a second or so once in a while
customer_reviews.text: Depending on what I am playing, the sound turns off for a second or two once in a while. I'm using Wifi connection. The sound quality and volume varies depending on what you are playing. Oh, unless you are going to keep it firmly placed without swiveling your TV, don't get it. It's too heavy for mounts so the soundbar will be facing the floor playing sound towards your feet.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Update: After less than a week and several hours and multiple service phone calls Samsung told me to send in the product for service. I had to pay out of pocket nearly $25 to the UPS store to safely ship it! Less than a week old! I called about the $25 and talked to the most disinterested person possible. I should've returned it! Do not buy this. The remote operates the system very sluggishly. Very often multiple presses are needed when just one should do it. Very odd misstep for a brand like Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: C0SM0 SIX5

customer_reviews.title: Works with a hope and a prayer
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking a Samsung TV and a Samsung sound bar would work great together but not. The HDMI arc un pairs every few days and is hard to get paired again. The power cord keeps falling out of the sound bar because the power cord is square and the hole is round. I can't return it because I tossed the original boxes, wasn't expecting problems, I'll save up again and get a Polk.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Davies

customer_reviews.title: Nice, integrated with the samsung 4K T.V. and a 4K DVD player nicely
customer_reviews.text: Not as balanced as you would think. Even with the bass turned to mid range, the bass can be overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lewsader

customer_reviews.title: Missing Mids/ dialogue/ warmth
customer_reviews.text: Dialogue difficult to hear--always straining even with clear dialog turned on. It was a little better with surround sound on. Could not find rears that would connect. Everything sounded a bit thin, like something was missing....warmth and full body . Turning up the volume would help, but then my ears would start ringing. I wanted to like it, but it just never put a smile on my face. Comparing to sonos 1, previous vizio soundbar circa 2015, fluance floor standing.
customer_reviews.author: DrillerHawk

customer_reviews.title: Best surround sound hand down.
customer_reviews.text: This system is awesome. I got it as used like new for $400 before taxes. The box had a few scratches on it but the soundbar and sub were in mint brand new condition. I can't believe the sound it puts out. Make sure to hook it up using the hdmi arc cable. I used an optic cable first and wasn't satisfied. Then I hooked it up using the provided hdmi arc cable and it sounds perfect now.
customer_reviews.author: SparkyDude

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This thing blows me away. It’s like being in a IMAX theater. No complaints whatsoever. Great clarity and great base. Truly enhances my viewing experiences.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to figure out
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy unless you have 2 days to do nothing but figure this out with support! It is poor
customer_reviews.author: Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Moving up a notch from "regular" soundbars. Deep surrounding sound, real theatre feeling. Clear strong sound without being loud.
customer_reviews.author: OGA

customer_reviews.title: Dont hesitate, buy buy buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great system, awesome price, better amazon prime service. Havent had issues yet with the kw850 as of yet. Samsung updated, and connected to my Samsung tv and phone without any headaches. Scepticism at first with price from seller, but beach camera rocks. Brand new original box, no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Delly

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: fast delivery and problem to adjust the sound not like when I hear from the Bestbuy store .
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook up and the sound is amazing. My home sounds like a movie theater.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Hazlett

customer_reviews.title: Soundbar quality is poor and defective
customer_reviews.text: Soundbar is defective and works only sometimes on some inputs. Quality is poor. The Samsung Q8C speakers sounds better. The Soundbar was to enhance that TV. Very disappointed in purchase and Amazon support
customer_reviews.author: Alton Lindo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. ......bass is fantastic on the sub...easy to connect to samsung tv....
customer_reviews.author: jorge andrade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Walker

customer_reviews.title: Best company best product
customer_reviews.text: Hi I just like to thank you so much your product is absolutely the best everything you promised is beyond my expectation thank you again I would recommend your company always
customer_reviews.author: AHARON EMANO

customer_reviews.title: I like the sounder and subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: I like the sounder and subwoofer. Now I need some wireless rear speakers and I'll be set. It's 100% better sound than the television alone!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel T. Sloan III

customer_reviews.title: NO ARC CONNECTION AFTER 3 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: I love all my Samsung products... multiple tv's, refrigerator, kitchen appliances, but this soundbar is awful. After 3 months the system failed to detect ARC connection, after replacing the HDMI cable, validating the ports connectivity, the one box ports, going through remote tech support, and may hours disconnecting, and reconnecting the entire system. It stopped working out of the blue. Now because i am outside the 30 return window i am stuck with a $600 giant Bluetooth speaker. what a joke!! the audio is sub par on Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Greer

customer_reviews.title: so good. I've only had it hooked up for a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I've only had it hooked up for a week, but I really like it. No problems!
customer_reviews.author: Jim K.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes my whole house shake it's amazing. Quality and clarity is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Hineman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality but not loud.
customer_reviews.text: 201704 When connected with HDMI cable the sound can't become loud as one would expect, but sound quality is good (other way around with Bluetooth connection).
customer_reviews.author: Samie

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: Soundbar came broken. Had to send it in to Samsung repair twice to get it fixed (and pay for some of the shipping). Once it was finally arrived working, the bass/sound for music was great. However, when watching TV, the soundbar would often cut out (whether or not I was in surround mode or just playing off the bar), and often turns on in WiFi mode (so I have to change the input back to DIn frequently when I turn my tv on). Overall, this product is a headache and wasn't worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Discotheque

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking about purchasing HW-K850, I think this product, documentation and support are the worst I've seen. The product also doesn't sound very good. save your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pangikas

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, breaks often, costs to repair when in warranty...
customer_reviews.text: Like others here this product breaks often. I'm on repair #2. Sure, they pay for the shipping label, but the soundbar is huge so unless you are one to keep every original box expect to pay $0 or so to package it up and ship it back. It broke within 2 weeks of coming back, so we're back to buying packing materials and shipping it back out again... It does sound great when it works, it's just a shame the 'when' is not very often. Stick with something more reliable until Samsung gets this right...
customer_reviews.author: Billy the Gram

customer_reviews.title: Blown speakers after 15 days
customer_reviews.text: These are a HUGE waste of money. They blew after 15 days- which is conviently the amount of return time Best Buy gives you- we are a family with a two year old and watch the foodnetwork and house hunters along with the Disney channel- so it’s safe to say we don’t abuse the speakers and there’s no acceptable reason they should already be blown. Tried to write Samsung and got canned answers and signed up for their marketing efforts instead. I honestly knew I should have stuck with bose speakers but let the sales guy get me. Please spend your money on a reputable speaker company and safe yourself the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: AKirtley

customer_reviews.title: Sound is amazing and voice controls with Echo / Alexa
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it. It sounds amazing, and workers with Bluetooth and amazon echo. The 850 has 350 watts. It sounds amazing. The speakers bounce the sound off my ceiling and it sounds so cool when stuff is coming at you from above and in front. I think having two rear speakers would round out the sound, which is the 950 model, but to be honest for my room setup this thing is amazing. Best soundbar on the market right now. I also have a echo dot hooked up to it and listen to music with voice controls. So amazing. Just buy it, and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erik-divedeeper

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome sound bar
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome sound bar! I have owned multiple pieces of Samsung audio and this is by far the best. The sound quality is greatly improved over other Samsung sound bars I have heard in the past. I have paired 2 of the Samsung multi room speakers as wireless rears speakers to create a full surround sound. I love the overhead effect that I get when I watch an Atmos movie, such a cool movie experience. I am also a big fan of the multi room capabilities so when we just want to listen to music around the house and I can use this sound bar to play music in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: PRiley27

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge piece of junk. Constantly disconnects and resets with the Samsung smart hub. Constantly having to manually set everything. I have a samsung tv and the arc connection is horrible. Crackles when it disconnects and goes back to tv speakers. Voice is hard to hear in anything no matter the setting. I finally went back to my 150$ surround setup and it sounds great. Theses sound bars are WAY over priced anyway for the hassle. Buy literally Anything else.
customer_reviews.author: A T

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Customer Support, Great Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Samsung's customer service is a joke, I was having issues getting the sub woofer to connect to the soundbar and am using an 8 series Samsung TV. After 36 minutes the first representative stopped responding, like I was put on a long hold and at 56 minutes (20 of silence) I called on my home phone and got a representative who suggested I return the soundbar... After multiple troubleshooting steps that I had to figure out myself the soundbar is connected. Again Samsung technical support is a joke, I have been in that industry before and they handled it like amateurs. Great soundbar/subwoofer combo when working though.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Quackenbush

customer_reviews.title: On it's Second warranty repair.
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar sounds pretty good BUT that's only when it works. Frustrating as can be, the connection is inconsistent, demanding resets, reboots, and multiple calls to Samsung tech support. I'm about to ship it back for its SECOND repair, and I haven't had it year. Look elsewhere for a good sound system for your TV.
customer_reviews.author: changes21st

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound for a high price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and very easy to setup. Dolby Atmos only works with HDMI and not bluetooth or optical. I can confirm that HDMI connections output 4k and HDR. I'm using HDMI 1 for my 4k bluray player and HDMI 2 for my ps4 pro.
customer_reviews.author: Morris1129PSN

customer_reviews.title: Discounts on 2016 Demo models.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound bar. Was waiting for Sony Atmos and or Pioneer Atmos bars to drop in price. Came across Samsung HWK850 Demo model for $469. Home run. Sound is awesome. Atmos not tested yet. Waiting on some Atmos content. Updated bars software should have Samsung recently added DTS support. Could not be more happy at this price. 2016 demo models are being discounted now. Go get them.
customer_reviews.author: richard g.

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth issue
customer_reviews.text: It’s been only 2 weeks guys. Started to see issues, omg. I am on the way to replace it. Please stay away, that’s my advice. I am planning to research more and buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Santhosh Kumar

customer_reviews.title: i just got and so far its amazing. i had a sony htst9 which i loved ...
customer_reviews.text: i just got and so far its amazing. i had a sony htst9 which i loved also but it developed a bad center channel amp. too exspensive to ship/fix.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wittig

customer_reviews.title: It sounded amazing in the store
customer_reviews.text: For the price the sound quality is not what I expected. It sounded amazing in the store, and I thought it would fill my large (30 x 20) living room with amazing sound but boy was I disappointed. When watching movies I could not get the response out of the sub I desired, even after messing with all the settings. I had a lot of issues with the app crashing and the sound cutting out while watching TV/movies. I had the product for 2 weeks before returning it. I purchased the Sonos soundbar and sub and couldn't be more happy. I would suggest you spend the additional $400 dollars on Sonos if you are shopping in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This sound bar is awesome. I work at best buy and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar is awesome. I work at best buy and it is the most phenomenal soundbar we have at the store. Even more so over Sonos I definitely recommend this sound bar and I know I will be getting one soon.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Horrible soundbars
customer_reviews.text: Complete piece of junk! Also, Samsung customer service is the worst of all time- I've had several soundbars, and they all broke. Samsung refused to fix any, and literally kept one and gave me no refund or replacement- just told me too bad. Edit 8/28/16: I've gotten a couple of comments, from people who apparently have nothing better to do with their time, saying I don't own the soundbar. For those who made the comments, please see attached pictures of the k850 box- in my back room.
customer_reviews.author: Gengler

product_meta.title: Samsung HW-K850/ZA 3.1.2 Channel Soundbar with Dolby Atmos Technology (2016 Model)
product_meta.description:
"Feel like you are in the center of the action with incredible sound that flows above and around you. Helicopters buzz overhead. Cars rush by, and the roar of the crowd engulfs. With 11 built-in speakers including 2 upward-firing drivers, wireless sub, rear wireless speakers, and Dolby Atmos technology, you feel the power of multidimensional sound*. 

Surround Expansion Plus upconverts audio content to up to 3.1.2 channels for a multi-dimensional sound experience."
feature_bullets: Get cinema style sound with 11 built-in speakers, including 2 upward-firing speakers and rear wireless speakers that deliver crystal clear sound from all around you.
Dolby Atmos transports you into the story with moving, three-dimensional audio that flows all around and above you with breathtaking realism. Multiroom Compatible : Wireless Multiroom Compatible
Proprietary Surround Sound Expansion Plus upconverts audio content up to 3.1.2 channels, adding an overhead sound dimension to virtually everything you watch.
With 4K Pass-Through, simply connect any 4K video source through the Samsung HW-K850 to your TV for the best in sound and 4K picture quality.
Designed and tuned in-house at Samsung's state of the art audio lab in Valencia, California, the Samsung HW-K850 boasts perfectly balanced, room filling sound.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars78 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
